AzureBlade's voice came back, but more insistant.

AzureBlade: Do you feel it? Do you remember these faces? This is 
Epyon, you commander, and Alpha, you friend! Do you feel them Condor? 
Do you see that the real lies are those the Decepticons gave you? Can 
you tell me how they brought you to their side? Open you eyes, Condor, 
open your eyes if only to see the Matrix! See the reality as it is!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Nightstrike::
> 
> Few and burried memories appeared in Nightstrike's mind in the same 
 
> time the planted memories by Megatron activated "the're lie... 
> they're lie " shouted Nightstrike who didn't know if he was anguised 
> or furious"I'm a decepticon... I've born as Deception... I swear 
> loyalty to Swichblade and after him to Megatron..."
> 
> "Condor, Condor" the name that once belonged him was beating inside 
> his mind. Nightstrike started to do an effor to woke up.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > AzureBlade: You are only half right. You were reborn as a 
> decepticon. 
> > Before that, you were one of us.
> > 
> > With some of his spark's power, he activates some maximal memories 
> of 
> > Nightstrike.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: This is the proof. These memories are yours. Do you 
> feel 
> > it? Do you remember how you were called?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > Nightstrike::
> > > 
> > > "I've born as Decepticon, I'm leaving as Decepticon..."roered 
> > > Nightstrike's spark "How can I be some else than a Decepticon?"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > AzureBlade: I am here to show you who you truly are. Can you 
> not 
> > > see 
> > > > that the one you think you are is merely a veil on your spark?
